execution_plan.description: Compute the average time (in seconds) between an order update and a subsequent customer profile update for the EU region.
execution_plan.query: SELECT 'EU' AS region, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (customers.updated_at - orders.updated_at))) AS avg_turnaround_seconds, COUNT(*) AS updates_count FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.id = orders.customer_id WHERE customers.updated_at > orders.updated_at;

execution_plan.description: Compute the average time (in seconds) between an order update and a subsequent customer profile update for the US region.
execution_plan.query: SELECT 'US' AS region, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (customers.updated_at - orders.updated_at))) AS avg_turnaround_seconds, COUNT(*) AS updates_count FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.id = orders.customer_id WHERE customers.updated_at > orders.updated_at;
